name: venta-carros
description: Repositorio para pagina de venta de carros. Esto aplicando los conocimientos de un curso de la plataforma Coursera

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run watch:scss" " npm run dev"
scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && usemin contactinfo.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contactinfo.html && usemin prices.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/prices.html && usemin terms.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/terms.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run scss && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin

author: Camilo Cuaspa
